sect2.para: The Show-H5Types cmdlet displays all pre-defined HDF5 datatype names and their defintions.

listitem.para: List HDF5 datatypes of class bitfield only.
List HDF5 datatypes of class float only.
List HDF5 datatypes of class integer only.
List HDF5 datatypes of class reference only.

example.title: Show all pre-defined HDF5 float datatypes
Show details for H5T_IEEE_F64LE
example.screen:
PS:1 > (Show-H5Types).H5T_IEEE_F64LE
Name Value ---- ----- SignBitPos 63 MantBitPos 0 ExpBias 1023 ByteOrder LE ExpBitPos 52 IntlBitPadding Zero BitOffset 0 Precision 64 MantNorm Implied LSBitPadding Zero Class FLOAT MSBitPadding Zero ExpBits 11 Size 8 MantBits 52
